review_text: My good friend was longing for a pressure cooker, so I thought I would surprise her with an early birthday present.  She says she really likes it.  It is nice looking and has the same footprint as the 4 qt. cooker (which is nice in a small kitchen).  She brought some beans she made in it to a cookout, and they were delicious.  I think it is a good value for the price.
